hooks.after:release: version_string=$(echo "${version}" | sed -E 's/([0-9]+\.[0-9]+\.[0-9]+).*$/\1/') && gh pr create --base develop --head release/$version_string --title 'Release ${version}' --body 'Release ${version}' && gh pr create --base master --head release/$version_string --title 'Release ${version}' --body 'Release ${version}'
